title: What is the value of x if the arithmetic mean of 2 and 2x-3 is 11? - Quora

response.answer_text: (2 + 2x -3) / 2 = 11 / 1 cross multiply the fractions 2 +2x -3 = 22 2x -1 = 22 2x = 23 x = 11.5 check the answer (2 +2(11.5) -3) / 2 = 11 / 1 2 +23 -3 = 22 22 = 22 answer checks
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Nicole Ann Mina

response.answer_text: 11.5 Let y = 2x - 3 Average of y and 2 is 11 So y + 2 = 22 So y = 20 So 2x - 3 = 20 So 2x = 23 And x = 11.5
